response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 38
response.overview: The 38th installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted! A long-selling work that has become an immovable title as a psychic video posted based on real records This time as well, in "Chartered Mountaintop Night View", two men and women climb a steep mountain trail. However, despite the shadow beyond the observatory, a terrifying figure appears from the cliff side.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 38
